Headline: #156 LaSalle Temporary Northbound Reroute near Belmont/Halsted
ShortDescription: Northbound #156 LaSalle buses are temp rerouted via Sheridan, West Sheridan, Pine Grove, Irving Park and Sheridan: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #156 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, West Sheridan, Pine Grove, Irving Park and Sheridan: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Halsted.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Resuming with Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following after we made repairs to a track condition near Western. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following after we made repairs to a track condition near Western.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
